import React, { Component } from 'react' import { addMovie } from '../../actions/moviesAction'; import Input from '../../components/common/Input'; import Button from '../../components/common/Button'; class MovieInsert extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { title:"", genre:"", numberInStock:"", description:"", image: null, rate: "", trailerLink: "", movieLength: "" } } /* handleChangeInputName = async event => { const name = event.target.value this.setState({ name }) } handleChangeInputRating = async event => { const rating = event.target.validity.valid ? event.target.value : this.state.rating this.setState({ rating }) } handleChangeInputTime = async event => { const time = event.target.value this.setState({ time }) } */ handleIncludeMovie = async () => { const { title, genre, numberInStock, description,image, rate, trailerLink, movieLength } = this.state const payload = { title, genre, numberInStock, description,image, rate, trailerLink, movieLength} await this.props.addMovie(payload).then(res => { window.alert(`Movie inserted successfully`) this.setState({ title:"", genre:"", numberInStock:"", description:"", image: null, rate: "", trailerLink: "", movieLength: "" }) }) } render() { const { title, genre, numberInStock, description,image, rate, trailerLink, movieLength } = this.state return (
